name: abnormally
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is abnormal (= different from what is usual or average): The success rate was abnormally high. An abnormally large number of students have signed up for my course. See
abnormal
More examplesFewer examplesHer heart was pumping abnormally. The lungs of baby monkeys develop abnormally when exposed to pollution. His squad is training in abnormally low temperatures.
